plugin.name: Copy_Colour_Output
plugin.author: Fiendish
plugin.description:
Copies text from the output window to the clipboard, with Aardwolf colour codes.
To use: highlight text and then:
Ctrl+D copy (like Ctrl+C but different) or: Ctrl + Left-click and select "Copy with Colour"

muclient.script:
require "color_copy"
function OnPluginListChanged() dofile "lua/aard_requirements.lua" end
function CopyScript(name, line, wildcs) cpstr = get_selection_with_color() if not cpstr then -- if nothing to copy from output window DoCommand("copy") else SetClipboard(cpstr) end end
AcceleratorTo ("Ctrl+D", "CallPlugin ('04d9e64f835452b045b427a7', 'CopyScript', '')", sendto.script)
